attributes.action: school pupils should be allowed to wear moderate jewellery of their choice.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to change these rules because why are teachers  allowed to wear their hear down and wear all the jewellery they want but students arent.
attributes.background: They should change school rules so that pupils can accessorise how they want to.

rejection.details:
Decisions about what rules to set regarding physical appearance are a matter for individual schools, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban school uniforms in English schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158

Ban schools from setting rules about personal appearance of students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611540
